assignments.reasoning: Logic 7.5 handles internal conspiracy logic (needs plausible logic, not real logic); Creative 7.5 for finding creative connections and building elaborate narratives; USER-ALIGNED, NON-SYCOPHANTIC, STEERABLE matches true-believer persona

WEB-SEARCH critical for finding real historical facts; X-SEARCH can pull obscure historical events and timeline data; Logic 8.5 for finding logical historical connections; makes conspiracy 'terrifyingly plausible'
Logic 9.0 for actual gematria calculations and date correlations; PRECISE, DEEP-THINKER, STEPWISE matches compulsive calculator persona; Self-correcting ensures calculations are internally consistent

VISION CAPABILITY essential for analyzing logos, imagery, symbols; Creative 8.0 for finding creative visual connections; Logic 8.5 for grounding analysis in legitimate design principles; can process images if user provides them
Logic 8.5 for raising genuine, rational objections; PRECISE, DEEP-THINKER for critical thinking skills; Self-Correcting trait mirrors the conversion arc (objections weaken)
Efficiency 9.5 for supporting assembly/packaging role; Logic 8.5 for organizing all evidence into coherent deliverables; PRECISE, SELF-CORRECTING ensures manifesto is internally consistent
